textTemplates.name: EmailBody2
textTemplates.text:
Greetings!

We hope this email finds you well.


We are writing to request your review and approval of the related case at your earliest convenience. Your approval is crucial as it will automatically generate a subsequent task, allowing us to proceed with the next steps efficiently.


Please find the details of the case attached for your perusal. If you have any questions or require additional information, do not hesitate to reach out.


  • Program Name: {!Get_Case_Records.Program_Name__c}
  • Program Case URL : https://wedc.lightning.force.com/{!Get_Case_Records.Id}

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.


--Please do not reply to this email--

textTemplates.name: InvestmentDevelopmentSubject
textTemplates.text: {!Get_Case_Records.Program_Name__c} Program is ready for Investment Development

textTemplates.name: ReworkEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Greetings!


I hope this message finds you well.

We are writing to inform you that your {!Get_Case_Records.Program_Name__c} requires rework.


During our review, we identified certain areas that need correction or additional information to ensure compliance with our requirements.


Please review Salesforce case which outlines the specific changes needed. Once the necessary adjustments are made, kindly resubmit the form at your earliest convenience.


If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to add comments on the Chatter feed within the Salesforce case

  • Salesforce Case Link: https://wedc.lightning.force.com/{!Get_Case_Records.Id}

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

--Please Do NOT Reply to this Email--

textTemplates.name: SystemIntegerationBody
textTemplates.text: You are being notified to complete a System Integration Task. {!Get_Case_Records.Program_Name__c} - program has been approved by the WEDC Board. Thank you for your assistance!

textTemplates.name: SystemIntegerationEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Please review the following Case for completing the integration tasks assigned to you:


Salesforce URL Link: https://wedc--mmpd.sandbox.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Case/{!Get_Case_Records.Id}/view
